body: Please, I need help finding my irl friends and I have no clue how to search on here. Thank you. (Grassgrill and xAirJohnstonex)
body_tagged: Please, I need help finding my irl friends and I have no clue how to search on here. Thank you. (Grassgrill and xAirJohnstonex)
title: How do I search/find players

replies.body:
Above
Or you can go to the games section and search their IGN in the search engine
replies.body_tagged:
Above
Or you can go to the games section and search their IGN in the search engine

replies.body:
You can also friend them on the website and look if they are online using /friends ingame. If you want to know what server a user is on you can always do /where <user>

Hope it helped :)
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
./go and /where don't seem to be working? I tried using it on an alt, didn't work.

Edit: /go works. /where doesn't
